title: 7- Recess Appointment Power
description: The Constitution says that the president can appoint important executive positions with the advice and consent of the Senate. But what if the Senate is out on recess? Does the president have to wait until the Senate comes back? Today we’ll explore the recess appointment power.
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
